revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=R8500 |revision=-100NAS
(Nighthawk X8) |series=AC5300 |asin=B015PD3HOC |newegg=N82E16833122814 |price=300 |est_release_date=10/01/2015 |fcc_date=05/26/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U12H334 |manuf_rev=T99 |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY315200309 |ic_id=4054A-15200309 |pcb_id=U12H334T99 |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=3.16 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4709C0;BCM4709C0KFEBG; |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G200TFI00 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G1646E-BYK0 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, J4,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4366 |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM4366 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4366 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53125S |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=6 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SE2623L;;4; ,,, 5GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5542;;8; ,,, 3-lane, 3-port PCIe Gen2 Switch;PLX Technology;PEX8603;;1; |flags=MU-MIMO, DFS, LACP, Link Aggregation |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=NETGEARXX |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}$ |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= }}
:• 2x '''2165''' Mbps - 2x 4-stream 802.11ac device (80MHz wide 5GHz channel), :• 1x '''1000''' Mbps - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''5300 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Nighthawk X8 - AC5300 Tri-Band WiFi Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-routers/R8500.aspx#tab-techspecs}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=R8500}} {{see also|Netgear R8300|Foxconn}} ===Product features=== *Get fastest speeds available up to 5.3 Gbps *Tri-band Wi-Fi delivers more Wi-Fi to more devices *Quad Stream delivers up to four data streams per Wi-Fi band *4 active and 4 internal antennas to amplify and maximize range *6 Gigabit Ethernet ports, aggregate two for fast file transfers *Smart Connect intelligently selects Wi-Fi band for every device *MU-MIMO for simultaneous streaming of data to multiple devices *Dynamic QoS prioritizes bandwidth by application and device ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Broadcom]] [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM47094 BCM47094] @1.4GHz (DualCore ARM Cortex A9) *Memory: 128 MB Flash (NAND) and 512 MB RAM (DDR3) *WLAN: 2x 4T4R AC [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM4366 BCM4366] + 1x 4T4R N [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM4366 BCM4366] *DualBand, NitroQAM, 5GHz (2x 2165Mbps), 2.4GHz (1000Mbps) *Seven (7x GbE) 10/100/1000 Mbps ports: 1x WAN & 6x LAN :LACP: Dual Gigabit Ethernet Port Aggregation (LAN1 + LAN2) *Two (2x USB) USB ports: 1x USB 3.0 & 1x USB 2.0 port *Dimension:: [[Dimensions::316 mm x 264 mm x 61 mm]] (WxHxD) *Weight: [[Weight::1680 g]] ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32890-netgear-r8500-nighthawk-x8-smart-wifi-router-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.hardwarezone.com.sg/feature-monster-ac5300-wireless-routers-face-asus-rt-ac5300-vs-netgear-nighthawk-x8 On '''HardwareZone'''] *[https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/netgear/nighthawk_x8_r8500/ On '''OpenITforum'''] (PL) :[https://openitforum.pl/gallery/album/167-netgear-r8500/ ''Gallery'' on '''OpenITforum'''] ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/netgear-r7500v2-r7800-r8500-have-shown-up.24717/ On '''SNB''' forums] ===News=== *[http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s889428 PR on '''Broadcom'''] *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/8862/quantenna-maintains-80211ac-technology-lead-as-broadcom-and-marvell-launch-new-chipsets PR on '''AnandTech'''] ===GPL Info=== *[https://github.com/mirror/dd-wrt/blob/master/src/router/netgear/ambitCfg-r8500.h On ''DD-WRT'' GitHub] {{SCollapse|GPL info >> • |
/*formal version control*/
#define AMBIT_HARDWARE_VERSION     "U12H334T00"
#define AMBIT_SOFTWARE_VERSION     "V1.0.0.56"
#define AMBIT_UI_VERSION           "1.0.28"
#define STRING_TBL_VERSION         "1.0.0.56_2.1.46.1"

#define AMBIT_PRODUCT_NAME          "R7800"
#define AMBIT_PRODUCT_ALIAS         "Nighthawk X8"
#define AMBIT_PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION   "802.11ac Dual Band Gigabit Wireless Router R7800"
#define UPnP_MODEL_URL              "http://www.netgear.com/Products/R7800.aspx"

#if defined(DUAL_TRI_BAND_HW_SUPPORT)
#define AMBIT_PRODUCT_NAME_TRI_BAND         "R8500"
#define AMBIT_PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION_TRI_BAND  "802.11ac Dual Band Gigabit Wireless Router R8500"
#define UPnP_MODEL_URL_TRI_BAND             "http://www.netgear.com/Products/R8500.aspx"
#endif

#define UPnP_MODEL_DESCRIPTION      "802.11ac"

/****************************************************************************
 * Board-specific defintions
 *
 ****************************************************************************/

/* Interface definitions */
#define WAN_IF_NAME_NUM             "eth0"
#define LAN_IF_NAME_NUM             "vlan1"
#define WLAN_IF_NAME_NUM            "eth1"
#define WLAN_N_IF_NAME_NUM          "eth2"
#if defined(R8000)
#define WLAN_5G_2_IF_NAME_NUM          "eth3"
#endif
#define WDS_IF_NAME_NUM             "wds0.1"    /* WDS interface */

/* Foxconn add start by aspen Bai, 11/13/2008 */
#ifdef MULTIPLE_SSID
#define WLAN_BSS1_NAME_NUM          "wl0.1"     /* Multiple BSSID #2 */
#define WLAN_BSS2_NAME_NUM          "wl0.2"     /* Multiple BSSID #3 */
#define WLAN_BSS3_NAME_NUM          "wl0.3"     /* Multiple BSSID #4 */

/* Foxconn add start, Tony W.Y. Wang, 03/22/2010 @For 5G*/
#define WLAN_5G_BSS1_NAME_NUM       "wl1.1"     /* Multiple BSSID #2 */
#define WLAN_5G_BSS2_NAME_NUM       "wl1.2"     /* Multiple BSSID #3 */
#define WLAN_5G_BSS3_NAME_NUM       "wl1.3"     /* Multiple BSSID #4 */

/* Foxconn add end, Tony W.Y. Wang, 03/22/2010 @For 5G*/
#define WLAN_5G_2_BSS1_NAME_NUM       "wl2.1"     /* Multiple BSSID #2 */
#define WLAN_5G_2_BSS2_NAME_NUM       "wl2.2"     /* Multiple BSSID #3 */
#define WLAN_5G_2_BSS3_NAME_NUM       "wl2.3"     /* Multiple BSSID #4 */
#endif /* MULTIPLE_SSID */
/* Foxconn add end by aspen Bai, 11/13/2008 */

/* GPIO definitions */
/* Foxconn modified start, Wins, 04/11/2011 */
#define GPIO_POWER_LED_GREEN        2
#define GPIO_POWER_LED_GREEN_STR    "2"
#define GPIO_POWER_LED_AMBER        3
#define GPIO_POWER_LED_AMBER_STR    "3"

#define GPIO_LOGO_LED_1             1
#define GPIO_LOGO_LED_1_STR         "1"
#define GPIO_LOGO_LED_2             9
#define GPIO_LOGO_LED_2_STR         "9"

#define GPIO_WAN_LED                8
#define GPIO_WAN_LED_2              9

#define GPIO_WIFI_2G_LED            13
#define GPIO_WIFI_5G_LED            12
#define GPIO_WIFI_5G_2_LED          -1  /*only for 8500*/
#define GPIO_WIFI_SUMMARY_LED       20
#define GPIO_WIFI_LNA_LED           15
 
#define GPIO_LED_SWITCH             5
#define GPIO_LED_BTN_LED            1

#define WPS_LED_GPIO                14

#if (defined INCLUDE_USB_LED)
#define GPIO_LED_USB        18
#define GPIO_USB_LED        18   /* USB1 LED. */
#define GPIO_USB1_LED       18   /* USB3.0 LED. */
#define GPIO_USB2_LED       17   /* USB2.0 LED. */
#endif /*INCLUDE_USB_LED*/

#define GPIO_USB1_ON_OFF    0
#define GPIO_USB2_ON_OFF    16

#define enable_usb_ports() { \
     system("gpio 0 1"); \
     system("gpio 16 1"); \
    }

#define disable_usb_ports() { \
     system("gpio 0 0"); \
     system("gpio 16 0"); \
    }

/*Buttons definitions, original in ~/swresetd/swresetd_config.h */
#define GPIO_RESET_BUTTON               10 /* Input */
#define GPIO_WPS_BUTTON                 4
#define GPIO_WIFI_BUTTON                19
#define GPIO_LED_BUTTON                 5

//#define SINGLE_FIRMWARE
#ifdef SINGLE_FIRMWARE
#define GPIO_POWER_LED_GREEN_8500        2
#define GPIO_POWER_LED_GREEN_STR_8500    "2"
#define GPIO_POWER_LED_AMBER_8500        3
#define GPIO_POWER_LED_AMBER_STR_8500    "3"

#define GPIO_LOGO_LED_1_8500             1
#define GPIO_LOGO_LED_1_STR_8500         "1"
#define GPIO_LOGO_LED_2_8500             9
#define GPIO_LOGO_LED_2_STR_8500         "9"

#define GPIO_WAN_LED_8500                8
#define GPIO_WAN_LED_2_8500              9

#define GPIO_WIFI_2G_LED_8500            13
#define GPIO_WIFI_5G_LED_8500            11
#define GPIO_WIFI_5G_2_LED_8500          12
#define GPIO_WIFI_SUMMARY_LED_8500       20
#define GPIO_WIFI_LNA_LED_8500           15 
 
#define GPIO_LED_SWITCH_8500             5
#define GPIO_LED_BTN_LED_8500            1
#define WPS_LED_GPIO_8500                14

#if (defined INCLUDE_USB_LED)
#define GPIO_LED_USB_8500        18
#define GPIO_USB_LED_8500        18   /* USB1 LED. */
#define GPIO_USB1_LED_8500       18   /* USB2.0 LED. */
#define GPIO_USB2_LED_8500       17   /* USB3.0 LED. */
#endif /*INCLUDE_USB_LED*/

/*Buttons definitions, original in ~/swresetd/swresetd_config.h */
#define GPIO_RESET_BUTTON_8500               10 /* Input */
#define GPIO_WPS_BUTTON_8500                 4
#define GPIO_WIFI_BUTTON_8500                19
#define GPIO_LED_BUTTON_8500                 5

#if defined(DUAL_TRI_BAND_HW_SUPPORT)
#define DUAL_BAND_HW_VER                 "R7800"
/* Foxconn add start, Snoopy.wu, 04/07/2015 */
#define DUAL_BAND_NTGR_SPECIFIC_HW_ID    ""
#define DUAL_BAND_NTGR_GENERIC_HW_ID     ""
/* Foxconn add end, Snoopy.wu, 04/07/2015 */
#define TRI_BAND_HW_VER                  "R8500"
/* Foxconn add start, Snoopy.wu, 04/07/2015 */
#define TRI_BAND_NTGR_SPECIFIC_HW_ID     "VEN_01f2&DEV_0021&REV_01"
#define TRI_BAND_NTGR_GENERIC_HW_ID      
 "VEN_01f2&DEV_8000&SUBSYS_01&REV_01 VEN_01f2&DEV_8000&REV_01"
/* Foxconn add end, Snoopy.wu, 04/07/2015 */
/* Foxconn add start, Snoopy.wu, 05/15/2015 */
#define Reboot_Waiting_Time "3300"
/* Foxconn add end, Snoopy.wu, 05/15/2015 */

#define FLASH_SIZE      (96*1024*1024)
#define MAX_SIZE_FILE   96*1024*1024
#define MAX_SIZE_KERNEL (MAX_SIZE_FILE)
#define MAX_SIZE_ROOTFS (MAX_SIZE_FILE)
#define MAX_SIZE_FILE_OPENSOURCE    MAX_SIZE_FILE
#define MAX_SIZE_KERNEL_OPENSOURCE  MAX_SIZE_FILE
#define MAX_SIZE_ROOTFS_OPENSOURCE  MAX_SIZE_FILE
#define BOARD_ID_OPENSOURCE         "U12H334T99_OPENSOURCE"
#define OPENSOURCE_START_MTD_IDX    (1)
#define OPENSOURCE_END_MTD_IDX      (1)

#define IMAGE_BLOCK_SIZE        0x20000
#define MAX_IMAGE_SIZE  MAX_SIZE_FILE

#endif /*_AMBITCFG_H*/
}} ===See also=== *[[List of Netgear Nighthawk Products]] *[[List of Costco Exclusive Wireless Devices]] *[[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]] ==Images== File:Netgear R8500 rear.jpg|Netgear R8500 back [[Has images::external| ]] __NOTOC__
